summary: Dog squeaky toy replacement SFX for getting melee killed by a dragon.
descriptionHtml:
First time I was killed by a dragon chomping me, I decided this needed to happen. Replaces the normal dragon munching/roar sound with a dog squeaky toy fit to the thrashing animation. I realize this doesn't happen that much in game, but is oh so satisfying when it does.

For manual download place the file in Skyrim/Data/Sound/fx/npc/dragon/killroar.
Go ahead and create the directory if it does not exist.

This will work in all versions of skyrim.
This should not interfere with any other mods, unless it changes the same sound.

http://youtu.be/hwGZWG3zxw8
author: Darklite
